snippet: An eastern Iowa city known for its moderate politics draws three presidential candidates in one day.
abstract: An eastern Iowa city known for its moderate politics draws three presidential candidates in one day.
lead_paragraph: DAVENPORT, Iowa - It took Carolyn Barry nearly until the caucuses to make up her mind. But her flirtations with a series of other candidates seemed a thing of the past as she enthusiastically shook Mitt Romney's hand while wearing a campaign button that spoke to suddenly solid support.

headline.main: Davenport Becomes a Magnet for Candidates
